name: 反社会学講座ブログ【スマートフォン】
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("pmazzarino.blog.fc2.com") {

  #ad_header,
  #unitedblades_div,
  .ad_footer,
  .fc2button-twitter,
  .contents_footer,
  [id*="imobile"],
  #footer_menu,
  iframe,
  
  .topentry_comment,
  .topentry_trackback,
  .entry_comment,
  .entry_trackback,
  
  #blog_menu li:first-child,
  #blog_menu li:nth-child(n+3):nth-child(-n+4),  

  #main_menu
  {display: none!important;}
  
}
